verses.verse: They brought <WH935> in the ark <WH727> of God, <WH430> and set <WH3322> it in the midst <WH8432> of the tent <WH168> that David <WH1732> had pitched <WH5186> for it: <WH7126> and they offered burnt offerings <WH5930> and peace offerings <WH8002> before <WH6440> God. <WH430>

When David <WH1732> had made an end <WH3615> of offering <WH5927> the burnt offering <WH5930> and the peace offerings, <WH8002> he blessed <WH1288> the people <WH5971> in the name <WH8034> of Yahweh. <WH3068>

He dealt <WH2505> to everyone <WH376> of Israel, <WH3478> both man <WH376> and woman, <WH802> to every one <WH376> a loaf <WH3603> of bread, <WH3899> and a portion of meat, <WH829> and a cake of raisins. <WH809>

He appointed <WH5414> certain of the Levites <WH3881> to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and to celebrate <WH2142> and to thank <WH3034> and praise <WH1984> Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel: <WH3478>

Asaph <WH623> the chief, <WH7218> and second <WH4932> to him Zechariah, <WH2148> Jeiel, <WH3273> and Shemiramoth, <WH8070> and Jehiel, <WH3171> and Mattithiah, <WH4993> and Eliab, <WH446> and Benaiah, <WH1141> and Obed-Edom, <WH5654> and Jeiel, <WH3273> with stringed instruments <WH5035> and with harps; <WH3658> and Asaph <WH623> with cymbals, <WH4700> sounding aloud; <WH8085>
and Benaiah <WH1141> and Jahaziel <WH3166> the priests <WH3548> with trumpets <WH2689> continually, <WH8548> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of God. <WH430>
Then on that day <WH3117> David <WH1732> first <WH7218> ordained <WH5414> to give thanks <WH3034> to Yahweh, <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Asaph <WH623> and his brothers. <WH251>
Oh give thanks <WH3034> to Yahweh. <WH3068> Call <WH7121> on his name. <WH8034> Make his doings <WH5949> known <WH3045> among the peoples. <WH5971>
Sing <WH7891> to him. <WH2167> Sing praises to him. <WH7878> Tell of all his marvelous works. <WH6381>
Glory <WH1984> in his holy <WH6944> name. <WH8034> Let the heart <WH3820> of those who seek <WH1245> Yahweh <WH3068> rejoice. <WH8055>
Seek <WH1875> Yahweh <WH3068> and his strength. <WH5797> Seek <WH1245> his face <WH6440> forever more. <WH8548>
Remember <WH2142> his marvelous <WH6381> works that he has done, <WH6213> his wonders, <WH4159> and the judgments <WH4941> of his mouth, <WH6310>
you seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> his servant, <WH5650> you children <WH1121> of Jacob, <WH3290> his chosen ones. <WH972>
He is Yahweh <WH3068> our God. <WH430> His judgments <WH4941> are in all the earth. <WH776>
Remember <WH2142> his covenant <WH1285> forever, <WH5769> the word <WH1697> which he commanded <WH6680> to a thousand <WH505> generations, <WH1755>
the covenant which he made <WH3772> with Abraham, <WH85> his oath <WH7621> to Isaac. <WH3327>
He confirmed <WH5975> the same to Jacob <WH3290> for a statute, <WH2706> and to Israel <WH3478> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285>
saying, <WH559> "I will give <WH5414> you the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> The lot <WH2256> of your inheritance, <WH5159>"
when you were but a few <WH4557> men in number, <WH4592> yes, very few, and foreigners were in it. <WH1481>
They went <WH1980> about from nation <WH1471> to nation, <WH1471> from one kingdom <WH4467> to another <WH312> people. <WH5971>
He allowed <WH3240> no man <WH376> to do them wrong. <WH6231> Yes, <WH3198> he reproved kings for their sakes, <WH4428>
"Don't <WH5060> touch my anointed <WH4899> ones! <WH5030> Do my prophets no harm! <WH7489>"
Sing <WH7891> to Yahweh, <WH3068> all the earth! <WH776> Display <WH1319> his salvation <WH3444> from day <WH3117> to day. <WH3117>
Declare <WH5608> his glory <WH3519> among the nations, <WH1471> and his marvelous works <WH6381> among all the peoples. <WH5971>
For great <WH1419> is Yahweh, <WH3068> and greatly <WH3966> to be praised. <WH1984> He also is to be feared <WH3372> above all gods. <WH430>
For all the gods <WH430> of the peoples <WH5971> are idols, <WH457> but Yahweh <WH3068> made <WH6213> the heavens. <WH8064>
Honor <WH1935> and majesty <WH1935> are before him. <WH6440> Strength <WH5797> and gladness <WH2304> are in his place. <WH4725>
Ascribe <WH3051> to Yahweh, <WH3068> you relatives <WH4940> of the peoples, <WH5971> ascribe <WH3051> to Yahweh <WH3068> glory <WH3519> and strength! <WH5797>

Ascribe <WH3051> to Yahweh <WH3068> the glory <WH3519> due to his name. <WH8034> Bring <WH5375> an offering, <WH4503> and come <WH935> before <WH6440> him. <WH7812> Worship Yahweh <WH3068> in holy <WH6944> array. <WH1927>
Tremble <WH2342> before <WH6440> him, <WH776> all the earth. The world <WH8398> also is established <WH3559> that it can't <WH4131> be moved.
Let the heavens <WH8064> be glad, <WH8055> and let the earth <WH776> rejoice! <WH1523> Let them say <WH559> among the nations, <WH1471> "Yahweh <WH3068> reigns! <WH4427>"
Let the sea <WH3220> roar, <WH7481> and its fullness! <WH4393> Let the field <WH7704> exult, <WH5970> and all that is therein!
Then the trees <WH6086> of the forest <WH3293> will sing for joy <WH7442> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> for he comes <WH935> to judge <WH8199> the earth. <WH776>
Oh give thanks <WH3034> to Yahweh, <WH3068> for he is good, <WH2896> for his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever. <WH5769>

Say, <WH559> "Save <WH3467> us, <WH430> God of our salvation! <WH3468> Gather us together <WH6908> and deliver <WH5337> us from the nations, <WH1471> to give thanks <WH3034> to your holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> to triumph <WH7623> in your praise. <WH8416>"

Blessed <WH1288> be Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> from everlasting <WH5769> even to everlasting. <WH5769> All the people <WH5971> said, <WH559> "Amen, <WH543>" and praised <WH1984> Yahweh. <WH3068>

So he left <WH5800> there, <WH6440> before the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of Yahweh, <WH3068> Asaph <WH623> and his brothers, <WH251> to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> continually, <WH8548> as every day <WH3117>'s work <WH1697> required; <WH3117>
and Obed-Edom <WH5654> with their brothers, <WH251> sixty <WH8346> - eight; <WH8083> Obed-Edom <WH5654> also the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> and Hosah <WH2621> to be doorkeepers; <WH7778>

and Zadok <WH6659> the priest, <WH3548> and his brothers <WH251> the priests, <WH3548> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Yahweh <WH3068> in the high place <WH1116> that was at Gibeon, <WH1391>

to offer <WH5927> burnt offerings <WH5930> to Yahweh <WH3068> on the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930> continually <WH8548> morning <WH1242> and evening, <WH6153> even according to all that is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Yahweh, <WH3068> which he commanded <WH6680> to Israel; <WH3478>

and with them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun, <WH3038> and the rest <WH7605> who were chosen, <WH1305> who were mentioned <WH5344> by name, <WH8034> to give thanks <WH3034> to Yahweh, <WH3068> because his loving kindness <WH2617> endures forever; <WH5769>

and with them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun <WH3038> with trumpets <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> for those that should sound <WH8085> aloud, <WH3627> and with instruments for the songs <WH7892> of God; <WH430> and the sons <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> to be at the gate. <WH8179>
All the people <WH5971> departed <WH3212> every man <WH376> to his house: <WH1004> and David <WH1732> returned <WH5437> to bless <WH1288> his house. <WH1004>
